pli-tv-bu-vb-pc20:2.1.11: “A lot” renders _bahukaṁ_. This is based on the commentary to Bu Pc 10, Sp 2.86: _Sakiṁ āṇatto bahukampi khaṇatīti sacepi sakaladivasaṁ khaṇati, āṇāpakassa ekaṁyeva pācittiyaṁ_, “_Sakiṁ āṇatto bahukampi khaṇatīti_: there is only one offense entailing confession for the one who asks, even if the other digs the entire day.”
